DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Evaluate Efficacy Two Dentifrices Dentine Hypersensitivity
DOC.detailed_description: A single centre , multi-site , randomise , examiner blind , two treatment , parallel group , non-inferiority design clinical study conduct healthy subject self-reported clinically diagnosed dentine hypersensitivity ( DH ) . This study compare effectiveness test dentifrice contain 5 % w/w calcium sodium phosphosilicate fluoride sodium fluoride commercially available dentifrice contain 5 % w/w calcium sodium phosphosilicate fluoride sodium monofluorophosphate , provide relief DH 4 8 week twice daily treatment .
